summary: Squash is a fun sport played with a racket and a small rubber ball in a closed court. Two or four players take turns hitting the ball against the walls. The goal is to make it hard for your opponent to return the ball. It's a popular game with around 20 million players worldwide. Squash will even be in the 2028 Olympics! The World Squash Federation (WSF) is in charge of the sport, and the Professional Squash Association (PSA) organizes professional tournaments.
title: Squash (sport)
